publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-226 Alasdair Allan: Success of Nicolson Institute Debating Team—That the Parliament congratulates the debating team from the Nicolson Institute, Stornoway, which won the Big Green Challenge competition, involving 34 schools in the Highlands and Islands, and recognises that this is a superb achievement for the school, but especially for the three members of the team.

S3M-226 Alasdair Allan: Success of Nicolson Institute Debating Team—That the Parliament congratulates the debating team from the Nicolson Institute, Stornoway, which won the Big Green Challenge competition, involving 34 schools in the Highlands and Islands, and recognises that this is a superb achievement for the school, but especially for the three members of the team. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Keith Brown*, Stuart McMillan*, Bashir Ahmad*, Robin Harper*
S3M-226 Success of Nicolson Institute Debating Team (lodged on 21 June 2007) Nanette Milne*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-226 Success of Nicolson Institute Debating Team (lodged on 21 June 2007) Mr Jamie Stone*
S3M-226 Success of Nicolson Institute Debating Team (lodged on 21 June 2007) Hugh Henry*, Kenneth Gibson*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-226 Success of Nicolson Institute Debating Team (lodged on 21 June 2007) Roseanna Cunningham* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
